title.en: Kanshikigakari no Inori - Henshitai kara no Last Voice

altTitles.ja: 鑑識係の祈り～変死体からのラストボイス～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanshikigakari no Inori - Henshitai kara no Last Voice

description.en:
The victim's "proof of life" is always found at the scene. 

Kuzuhara Akane is a new forensic investigator assigned to the Criminal Investigation Division. As Akane strives to become a full-fledged forensic investigator, she meets Sugurishiro, a man with 12 years of experience in the same forensic investigation division who has an unrivaled fetish for bones. 

At the first crime scene she goes to with Sugurishiro, they come face to face with a drowned body that has been pulled from the sea. Akane's legs freeze when she sees the Severely damaged body. However, the identity of the body that Suguris discerns is a surprising person...?

 A shocking detective forensic mystery in which the truth is revealed by the last voice of the unnatural death ! 

---

Based on the story "The Prayer of the Forensic Investigation Division: The Case Files of the Osaka Prefectural Police's "Unnatural Deaths" (Murakami Kazuo, Wakaba Bunko). Supervised by Murakami Kazuo (former Osaka Prefectural Police Inspector)
